docs.abstract: Randall Munroe, physicist and creator of Web comic xkcd, uses both absurdity and pop culture references to explain complex physical phenomena, often turning to readers of his comic for additional material; Munroe has collected scientific answers to absurd hypotheticl questions in book What If?.

headline.seo: Randall Munroe, the Creator of XKCD, Explains Complexity Through Absurdity
